item.description:
I guess we should give in and see this big block buster super hero movie.

Showtime is 7:15.  I will be at the theater by 6:15 and we will head in for seats by 6:45.

The movie is showing downstairs in the IMAX theater.  Things are a little crazy when doing a meetup there.  I will be there, near the ropes till they let us either line up in the inner lobby or into the theater.   If you want to sit with the group, I advise showing up early.

There has been tons of buzz about this movie and tickets are on sale now, so I STRONGLY advise buying your tickets ASAP.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We will try to gather in the inner lobby to allow for restroom breaks, a brief discussion about the movie and getting a head count for the after event.   If that is not possible, we will gather outside the theater in the front.

Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after and bring cash.


Movie Details:

Release Date: May 4, 2012 (3D/2D theaters and IMAX 3D)
Studio: Walt Disney Pictures, Marvel Studios, Paramount Pictures
Director: Joss Whedon
Screenwriter: Joss Whedon
Starring: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner, Tom Hiddleston, Stellan Skarsgård, Cobie Smulders, Samuel L. Jackson
Genre: Action, Adventure
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: Marvel.com/Avengers_Movie

Plot Summary: Continuing the epic big-screen adventures started in "Iron Man," "The Incredible Hulk," "Iron Man 2," "Thor" and "Captain America: The First Avenger," "Marvel's The Avengers" is the superhero team up of a lifetime. When an unexpected enemy emerges that threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, Director of the international peacekeeping agency known as SHIELD, finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Marvel's The Avengers (7:15PM Show.....IMAX 3D)
